headline: GTA Online
subtitle: This Week on the Podium: A Pretty Pink BF Club
content:
Nothing sets the heart aflutter like the sound of clattering chips and the smell of defeat. Swing by the lobby of The Diamond Casino & Resort, give the Lucky Wheel a spin, and walk away with GTA$, clothing, accessories, snacks, not to mention all sorts of mystery prizes.

This week's top prize is a set of keys for the very pink BF Club perched on the podium.
